properties.entry: SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME FROM CONTACTS_CATEGORY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CONTACTS_NO , CONTACTS_NAME , CONTACTS_TYPE , CATEGORY_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , PHONE , PHONE_PUBLIC , TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , PROFILE_FILE_NO , USER_AUTH FROM USERS WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_AUTH, USER_NAME
